org.benow.java.rest
Class DocumentLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.benow.java.rest.DocumentLoader

public class DocumentLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to load pages and XML documents from a site. Uses caching and gzip compression for performance. Implements throttling of requests, if specified.

Author:
andy

setLoadInterval

public void setLoadInterval(long loadInterval)
set the minimum time between requests (in millis). If requests arrive more frequently than this interval, then the thread will be stalled, throttling requests. Set to 0 or less to disable.

Parameters:
loadInterval -

disableCaching

public void disableCaching()
Turns caching off. Responses will not be cached and results will not be returned from the cache.
